body:
Hi Mostapha: thanks for your interest.

At first I did get an error asking for the gendaymtx file which it could not find but I had already solved that downloading as you say the file from an older discussion.



The thing is now it is a .mtx file (depending from the .epw I think) which it cannot find now. I'm trying to make an evaluation for Santiago in Chile: I already downladed the Santiago.epw file but now it is asking (as you can see in the image I attached) for let's say Santiago.mtx and that one I don't know how to get.



Thanks a lot for your attention!
